categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Drak" was a clone trooper who served in the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars against the Confederacy of Independent Systems. Drak served under Jedi Padawan Leh'ahnyo Vas and at one point during combat, saved Taya and Tam. Drak was equipped with white clone trooper armor and sported bold red lines on his helmet. He was armed with a heavy blaster rifle.
Drak was mentioned in Rise of the Separatists, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
